name: Witch With a Shotgun
description:
Made in under 9 hours for Triple Trijam 2022!

You, a witch with nothing to her name but a few spell jars and a shotgun, must banish the baleful ghouls that haunt these ruins. Destroy their Obelisks to consecrate this land, before they can take you to the Underworld!

===Controls===

Hold space to use your sixth sense and make your enemies visible.

WASD to move.

Left click to shoot.

R to reload.

Right click to throw a spell jar.

===Jam Info===

Chosen Theme: Sixth Sense

Made in Game Maker Studio in under 9 hours.

All art and sounds are mine. Sound effects made using BFXR.

Build 1: https://jesscapade.itch.io/witch-with-a-shotgun-build-1?secret=9VbxHVCRyYZZTVC4l...

Build 2: https://jesscapade.itch.io/witch-with-a-shotgun-build-2?secret=JUWW4Lsh5eL3WiU4g...
